message.content:
cs.DC, cs.AR, cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.LG. 

The paper discusses software strategies for managing resilience to errors in HPC systems, which falls under the category of Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC). The concept of havens and their implementation in memory management is related to the field of Architecture (cs.AR) and Software Engineering (cs.SE). The proposed language support for havens involves type annotations, which is a topic in Programming Languages (cs.PL). Finally, the use of annotations to affect the resiliency of a conjugate gradient solver application may also be relevant to Machine Learning (cs.LG).
